nodes.bodyText: 🤦‍♂ , I didn't mean that sorry. I meant if the suggestion to check if they did review their own code is a kind of redundant. I'd say it's an overhead to click on the task for something that by definition should be done anyway. If they don't, it might mean they are skipping the convention process of reviewing their own changes, but that's something we cannot control with a check.
